sense.name: anything which is the intended goal
sense.examples: The commandos' objective was to secure a secret post behind enemy lines. The sales force did not meet their objective for the second quarter. What is the objective of the protagonist in this novel?

sense.name: the lens of an optical instrument closest to the observed object
sense.examples: The objective of the microscope was slightly scratched. The objective of this telescope is a refractive lens.

sense.name: the objective grammatical case
sense.examples: Languages in this family mark objective case and intransitive nominal case the same way. English indicates the objective case largely through word order, not through morphological markers.
